ratings.comment: Byers is a funny teacher and is clear during lectures. He managed to entertain me for the majority of the semester. Take good notes and pay attention in class and you will do well on the exams. I recommend this class if you are interested in evolution at all.
Funny guy. And really, his tests aren't hard if you're willing to take good notes and study. The discussion section projects are pretty annoying though.

My first and greatest professor. He has a great sense of humor and makes the information very interesting. Even after lots of studying, his tests are difficult. If you know the concepts and are confused by the wording or just are unsure, ask him because he is extremely helpful and very patient.
Favorite Prof
Interesting man; but retired last year.

He's a funny professor but the tests ARE tricky! Literally, every question on the exams includes "all of the above" and "none of the above." If you are looking for a seriously easy geology class, I suggest GEO 101.

One of the BEST PROFS IVE EVER HAD. the class is very interesting, very easy, and he's hilarious. plus, what could be cooler to learn about than dinosaurs, evolution, and the origins of life on earth?
really great prof, funny and interesting (most of the time). another ridiculously easy course

Charlie can be hilarious, he can also put you to sleep and I enjoyed this class even though the tests were tricky. The geology department will be surely lacking without him!! If you didn't take him, you've missed out.
He is a pretty goofy and entertaining guy. Tests could be tricky, but mostly a straightforward class.
Best Teacher in my 5 years! Funny, intelligent- amazing class!
He is fun, and entertaining. Lectures weren't too bad. Tests were a little tricky, but manageable.

Prof. Byers is so far my favorite prof I've had in three years at UW. He loves what he teaches and makes boring topics seem interesting. He is very smart. His tests are more difficult than they should be, and sometimes studying doesn't even help. It's certainly not an easy A but DEFINETELY worth taking!
Evolution and extinction was probably my favorite class last semester. Byers keeps everything interesting and makes everything seem so simple.
Prof is funny, but class can be boring and test are quite tricky because of the odd wording.

He was an awesome professor! he made class interesting, and he was hilarious! The class was pretty easy, and so were the tests if you came to class and took notes. The TAs were AWESOME, if you can, get MaryRuth, she was so nice and helpful! The final was a little more detailed than i though, but overall, and VERY FUN class! recomend this class/prof
he's a sweet prof./very knowledgable.  the subject matter got very dry after our first exam...  but whatev, he's a good prof.

He's hilarious and lecture is very entertaining. Tests, however, are pretty tricky. You may think you know the material, but he likes to throw in "all of the above" and "none of the above" in EVERY multiple choice question. Sometimes throws in bogus questions, but that's just my opinion.
A great teacher.  Keeps class entertained.  Very easy if you take good notes.  Interesting subject matter.  Great science class to take if you are not a science major.

Awesome professor and really interesting class. Easy to take difficulty for granted because you basically don't do any work until the exam, which can be pretty difficult. Make sure to take good notes and don't zone out because test questions are one's you probably didn't cover that well. Hilarious guy though.
really funny and entertaining professor. you can tell he really loves his topic. tests are tricky but if you study your lecture notes you shoud do ok.

Funny guy, keeps things light and easy. Wording on tests, along with "all of the above" and "none of the above" being a choice for every question, makes class fairly difficult, but the material itself is rather simplistic and interesting.
He rocks.  One day he turned around and was wearing a Yoda mask.  By far the best class at the University.  Tests are tricky, but don't read the book.  Great class.
Funny professor, keeps it interesting, not extremely difficult, but tests are pretty tricky
Good class....the professor is so funny and the tests are tricky but arent hard if you study.
His tests are not fun, no tests are, but his have such hard wording and precisive answers that it's a real pain
No Comments
This guy is hilarious, and 110 is a great class. I highly recommend him.
I agree. Great professor, interesting material, non-drowsy lectures, a good one to take if you're a non-science major who needs those general education requirements.
Interesting class.  THE BEST PROFESSOR.  Kinda hard though.
